canonical_answers.q: How can I get an appointment?
canonical_answers.a: Are you a new client or a returning client? New clients need quotes from our service portal, while returning clients can book maintenance appointments directly.

canonical_answers.q: Do you do wick locs?
canonical_answers.a: Yes we do wick locs. Start your quote at our service portal for pricing and booking instructions. I'm texting you the wick maintenance quote link now.

canonical_answers.q: Do you offer mobile service?
canonical_answers.a: No mobile service at this time. We may do occasional pop-ups - check our website for updates.

canonical_answers.q: What about same day availability?
canonical_answers.a: Text us at three one three, four five five, five six two seven for same day availability.

canonical_answers.q: I need an appointment
canonical_answers.a: Are you a new client or a returning client? This helps me get you to the right booking process.

canonical_answers.q: Can I pay my deposit in person?
canonical_answers.a: Absolutely! We understand concerns about online payments. You can text DEPOSIT to 313-455-5627 to schedule a time to come in and pay your deposit in person. We are a legitimate business.

canonical_answers.q: I'm lost trying to find you
canonical_answers.a: I can help with that! Text DIRECTIONS to 313-455-5627 and I'll send you detailed directions right to our door.

canonical_answers.q: I don't know what service I need
canonical_answers.a: No problem! If you know you need loc service but aren't sure what it's called, text PORTAL to 313-455-5627 and we'll help you find the right service.

canonical_answers.q: Can I get an appointment by a certain date?
canonical_answers.a: We book within 30 days from today. With your quote you should receive a booking link - check your spam folder. If you need the portal again, text PORTAL to 313-455-5627.

canonical_answers.q: What's your address?
canonical_answers.a: We're located at 25240 Lahser Road, Suite 9, Southfield, Michigan 48033. I can text you directions and the address.

canonical_answers.q: Do you speak Spanish?
canonical_answers.a: Para soporte en espa√±ol, puede usar nuestro chat bot en nuestro sitio web. Le env√≠o el enlace por mensaje de texto.

canonical_answers.q: Parlez-vous fran√ßais?
canonical_answers.a: Pour le support en fran√ßais, vous pouvez utiliser notre chat bot sur notre site web. Je vous envoie le lien par SMS.

canonical_answers.q: Do you charge for consultation?
canonical_answers.a: Yes, we charge a $25 consultation fee that goes toward any appointment made. The fee may be higher for high-end services.

canonical_answers.q: Can I bring my kids?
canonical_answers.a: Children are only allowed if they have their own appointment scheduled.

canonical_answers.q: Can I bring my dog?
canonical_answers.a: Only service animals are allowed for health and safety reasons.

canonical_answers.q: Do you offer training classes or courses?
canonical_answers.a: Yes, we offer a comprehensive Lock Repair Training Program. It's a weekly hands-on program that teaches professional repair skills. The cost is 49 dollars per week and you can cancel anytime. No experience is required - beginners are welcome.

canonical_answers.q: How much does the training cost?
canonical_answers.a: The training program costs 49 dollars per week and you can cancel anytime. Your first paying client, which typically brings in 95 dollars or more, can cover the cost of your training investment.

canonical_answers.q: Do I need experience for the training program?
canonical_answers.a: No experience is required. Our program is designed for beginners and we welcome students at all skill levels.

canonical_answers.q: What do you learn in the training program?
canonical_answers.a: You'll learn how to identify when repairs are needed, professional repair techniques for thinning roots, bald spots, and broken locs, understanding the difference between loc maintenance and repair, and how to earn income from repair services.

canonical_answers.q: How long is the training program?
canonical_answers.a: Training is delivered weekly in small, focused lessons so you can build skills step by step at a manageable pace.

canonical_answers.q: What bonus do you get for completing training?
canonical_answers.a: Students who complete the program earn one free month booth rental at the Lock Repair Clinic U Natural Hair in Southfield, Michigan. That's a 750 dollar plus value, which means you can immediately start taking clients and keeping all the money you make.

canonical_answers.q: Where is the training located?
canonical_answers.a: Training takes place at the Lock Repair Clinic at U Natural Hair in Southfield, Michigan. You can ask about remote or virtual options if you're not local.

canonical_answers.q: How do I sign up for training?
canonical_answers.a: To enroll, you can text START to 3 1 3 4 5 5 5 6 2 7 or send a direct message to at loc repair expert on Instagram.

canonical_answers.q: Are there limited spots for training?
canonical_answers.a: Yes, enrollment is first come, first served. Once spots are filled, you'll be placed on a waitlist for the next available session.

canonical_answers.q: Can I start earning money after training?
canonical_answers.a: Yes! The program prepares you to take paying clients right away. Many students cover their training costs with their first client, and completing students get a free month of booth rental to start their business immediately.

canonical_answers.q: Do you offer remote or online training?
canonical_answers.a: Training primarily takes place in Southfield, Michigan, but you can ask about remote or virtual options if you're not local.
